Episodes.Title: First Day
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: BFFs Maya and Anna start their first day of 7th grade.

Episodes.Title: Miranda
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Maya and Anna become fascinated by the mature girls in their class who smoke. They are faced with the age old question: stay home and play pretend or go out and do drugs?

Episodes.Title: Ojichan
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Maya gets a visit from an old family member while Anna feels left out.

Episodes.Title: Solo
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Trailview's Night of Amazing Music is coming up. Anna hopes to win Alex's heart with a classical aria while Maya is consumed with a lie.

Episodes.Title: Community Service
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Maya and Anna volunteer for community service by participating in a fashion show.

Episodes.Title: Posh
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Maya gets a questionable nickname during a school project. Anna goes along with it, resulting in a test of their friendship and identities.

Episodes.Title: AIM
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Maya and Anna get their very first AIM screennames and their social world opens up. Maybe too much.

Episodes.Title: Wild Things
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Taylor Nichols
Episodes.Plot: It's a viewing party to watch the recently released VHS movie, Wild Things. The night gets sexy and Anna and Maya try to keep up.

Episodes.Title: Anna Ishii-Peters
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: Anna gets to sleep over at Maya's house on a school night and can't wait to become part of the Ishii-Peters family. But things turn as Anna gets a little too comfortable.

Episodes.Title: Dance
Episodes.Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Episodes.Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Mutsuko Erskine
Episodes.Plot: It's the night of the first school dance but Anna and Maya are in bad terms. They'll have to navigate this unfamiliar terrain set to billboard hits, by themselves.
